attributes.action: Reconsider compulsory community service as a real dumb idea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I look at our society and see so much that needs to be improved or taken back to more sensible values, You as politicians are partly possibly largly responsible for the deplorable state of our once great country. Do something that requires a spine! Close all shops on a Sunday, stop extended hours for Pubs, Make Parents responsible for their Childs behaviour. Fix the imigration problem to the satisfaction of the real decendants of this country.
Dont pick on the kids who will do good in this world as the ones who wont will not do your community service and you wont have the spine to make them.
